title: Reddit - The heart of the internet
text: Official Discussion - Smile [SPOILERS] Poll If you've seen the film, please rate it at this poll If you haven't seen the film but would like to see the result of the poll click here Rankings Click here to see the rankings of 2022 films Click here to see the rankings for every poll done Summary: After witnessing a bizarre, traumatic incident involving a patient, Dr. Rose Cotter starts experiencing frightening occurrences that she can't explain. Rose must confront her troubling past in order to survive and escape her horrifying new reality. Director: Parker Finn Writers: Parker Finn Cast: - Sosie Bacon as Rose Cotter - Jessie T. Usher as Trevor - Kyle Gallner as Joel - Caitlin Stasey as Laura Weaver - Robin Weigert as Dr. Madeleine Northcott - Kal Penn as Dr. Morgan Desal - Judy Reyes as Victoria Munoz -- Rotten Tomatoes: 76 Metacritic: 69 VOD: Theaters
